name: Midnight Madness (rogr)
description:
Description:

Midnight Madness is a top-down 2D horror-survival game in which you must face off against a ferocious enemy in the night. You must learn to use various abilities to outsmart the enemy and locate the four ship parts scattered across the island so you can build a ship and escape.

How to run on MacOS:

1. Open terminal and navigate to the folder you unzipped the game to.

2. cd MacBuild.app 

3. cd Contents/MacOS

4. chmod u+x Midnight Madness

You can use tab to autocomplete so you don't have to try to type space in terminal.

5. ./Midnight Madness

6. Click OK on the popup

7. Open System Preferences -> Security & Privacy

8. At the bottom you should be able to click "Open Anyway"

9. The game should open!

Credits:
